growbeId.description: ID of the growbe to get data

moduleId.description: Module to get the data from

lastX.description: Last X Unit of time , default to Date

from.description: if specify , get data from interval from this date

to.description: if specify , get data from interval before this date

items.description: list of fields of the module to get, create one series pet fields

liveUpdate.description: if true the data will be fetch , only possible with lastX
